ygData.msgSnippet: OOC: Sounds fair. They have no idea what s going on past the dense forest so they assume they ve lost the sweeps, due to what they know right now.  And yeah, I

OOC: Sounds fair. They have no idea what's going on past the dense forest s=
o they assume they've lost the sweeps, due to what they know right now.  An=
d yeah, I think it would be nice for them to return to the site of the old =
fortress, to see if they can locate their lost comrade.  It would be a good=
 tension grabber for Rodimus, and Tucson alike.  In some respects, Night Sh=
ift is just like Tucson, which means he has quite a bit of his tenacity to =
see a job fully completed.  But being a ninjabot entirely, he's also  bit d=
ifferent, in the sense that he'd probably do things as ingognito as possibl=
e.
